queries.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__mb_motivation_items` ( `motivation_item_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL auto_increment, `company_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `position` smallint(5) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `expanded` char(1) NOT NULL default 'Y', `vendor_edit` char(1) NOT NULL default 'Y', `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', `icon_type` varchar(32) NOT NULL default '', `icon_class` varchar(64) NOT NULL default '', `icon_color` varchar(20) NOT NULL default '', `exclude_categories` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `exclude_destinations` char(1) NOT NULL default 'N', `template_path` text CHARACTER SET utf8, `template_settings` text CHARACTER SET utf8 NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`motivation_item_id`, `company_id`), INDEX exc_categories (`exclude_categories`), INDEX exc_destinations (`exclude_destinations`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__mb_motivation_item_descriptions` ( `motivation_item_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `name` varchar(255) NOT NULL default '', `description` mediumtext, PRIMARY KEY (`motivation_item_id`, `lang_code`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__mb_motivation_item_objects` ( `motivation_item_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `object_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL default '0', `object_type` char(1) NOT NULL default 'C', PRIMARY KEY (`motivation_item_id`, `object_id`, `object_type`), INDEX mid_otype (`motivation_item_id`, `object_type`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `?:ab__mb_vendors_descriptions` ( `motivation_item_id` mediumint(8) unsigned NOT NULL, `company_id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL default 0, `lang_code` char(2) NOT NULL default '', `description` mediumtext, `status` char(1) NOT NULL default 'A', PRIMARY KEY (`motivation_item_id`, `company_id`, `lang_code`) ) DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
